name: Menubar
description: Horizontal desktop-style menubar with dropdown menus and keyboard navigation.

use: you need top-level app menus (File, Edit, View).
you want menu items to open submenus with keyboard support.
avoid: a mobile-first or overflow menu is sufficient.

theming: `MenubarTheme` controls borders, padding, and submenu offsets.
accessibility: Ensure top-level menu items are reachable via keyboard navigation.
dont: Use menubars for primary mobile navigation.
